longBusinessSummary: Wonderla Holidays Limited operates amusement parks and resorts in India. The company operates through Amusement Parks and Resort, and Others segments. It also offers various land and water rides. In addition, it sells merchandise, cooked food, packed foods, and beverages etc. Wonderla Holidays Limited operates restaurants, banquet halls, food courts, lounge bar, and hotel rooms. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
